metadata.title: CVE-2024-55918 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Graphics::ColorNames package before 3.2.0for Perl. There is an ambiguity between modules and filenames that can leadto HTML injection by an attacker who can create a file in the currentworking directory.

criterions.comment: libgraphics-colornames-perl package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
